refnamediv.refpurpose: control the quota of a btrfs filesystem

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: btrfs quota is used to enable/disable or rescan subvolume quota of a btrfs filesystem.
For setting quota or other quota operations on a btrfs filesystem, please see btrfs-qgroup(8) for details.

warning.simpara: Quota and qgroup in btrfs filesystem is not stable and impacts performance in mainline kernel yet(v3.14 so far).

listitem.simpara: Enable subvolume quota support for a filesystem.
Disable subvolume quota support for a filesystem.
Trash all qgroup numbers and scan the metadata again with the current config.
show status of a running rescan operation.
wait for rescan operation to finish(can be already in progress).

refsect1.title: EXIT STATUS
refsect1.simpara: btrfs quota returns a zero exit status if it succeeds. Non zero is returned in case of failure.

refsect1.title: AVAILABILITY
refsect1.simpara: btrfs is part of btrfs-progs. Please refer to the btrfs wiki http://btrfs.wiki.kernel.org for further details.
